1.name: Zero to Hero
1.text: Complete a raid starting only with your knife.

2.name: Friday the 13th
2.text: Hunt down and eliminate PMCs with a Jason Mask and your knife.

3.name: Zero to Hero - Hardcore
3.text: Complete a raid starting with absolutely nothing.

4.name: Escape from Tarkov
4.text: Complete a full marathon playthrough starting from Ground Zero and extracting on Shoreline.

5.name: Escape from Tarkov - Hardcore
5.text: Complete a full marathon playthrough starting from Ground Zero and extracting on Shoreline.  Your only starting equipment is your knife.

6.name: Definitely Not a Scav
6.text: Disguise yourself as a scav, infiltrate, and eliminate other scavs.

7.name: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
7.text: Complete a raid using only revolver type weapons.

8.name: One in the Chamber
8.text: Complete a raid using only the MP18 OR any rifle WITHOUT magazines.

9.name: Power of the Sun
9.text: Run an AR or shotgun with the maximum amount of flashlight attachments.

10.name: Heavy Metal
10.text: Complete a raid using a Machine gun while wearing the Zabrallo and an Altyn.
